1.Install the game
2.Copy the crack to Game dir
3.Install Steam
4.Change the Time Zone to +8.00 (Beijing, Hongkong...)
5.Change the date to 14th NOV 2012
6. Create a firewall rule to block the CODBO2 SP.exe
7. Create a exception for the folder where CODBO2 istalled.
6.Right click the Single Player ICON and Run as Admin
7Enjoy the game

I NEED A WORKING CRACK......

yeah, that was the key thomas_gabriel. Date = 11/14/2012, and run as admin. I've modified a batch script to do all this for me. Just save the following in a text editor as a file with the .bat extension. Also right click t6sp.exe and go to compatibility tab, tick the box for run as administrator.  Also you'll need to modify the lines for the location to cd to where t6sp is located and the time zone you reside in. Here is the text: 

@echo off
TZUTIL /s "North Asia Standard Time"
set TMPDATE=%DATE%
date 11-14-12
D:
cd GamesCall of Duty 9Game
t6sp.exe
WAIT 1
date %TMPDATE%
TZUTIL /s "Eastern Standard Time"
exit

@GMHTFSL

i have tested it on gtx 580, gtx 690, HD6990 n HD7970. I think your graphic card is your problem
